timeline.message:
{561365] Richtext can save previous description into the current element

- Merge capella and diagram sections, the switch between diagram
elements and diagram blank is quicker
- Avoid unnecessary several layouts of the view
- Improve the switch between 'Already opened' and property view

Change-Id: Ia13aa022ec1724b932249144ef1d6eacaae00ae9
Signed-off-by: Philippe DUL <philippe.dul@thalesgroup.com>

{561365] Improve layout of Richtext property view

- Remove unnecessary Group
- Use widgetFactory to create the 'Already Opened' label, to prevent
gray background on Property View

Change-Id: I75566c2c26f463aaab4fd54691a7f3754b7b5d7d
Signed-off-by: Philippe DUL <philippe.dul@thalesgroup.com>
